course_description: This course is taken after the completion of the CE551TPa,b and CE552TPa,b sequences. Participants are assigned to student pastor groups in respective districts under the leadership of the teaching parish supervisory pastors, United Methodist ministers who serve as Candler adjunct faculty. Coursework is experiential and collegial in nature, with student-pastors engaging in practice and reflection on a variety of ministerial activities (e.g., preaching, systems, analysis, planning, and teaching).
